Class PerspectiveRayTracer

  • java.lang.Object

    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • update

        public void update(org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D position,
                   org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D rotation,
                   float dt)
        Set camera position and rotation, depending on the type of camera.
        Specified by:
        update in class Camera
        Parameters:
        position - value of the controlled player position.
        rotation - value of the controlled player rotation.
        dt - the amount of elapsed game time since the last frame.
